info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 26 at 3:49PM MST until September 26 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
info.description:
FFWPSR
The National Weather Service in Phoenix has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona...
* Until 600 PM MST.
* At 349 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Avondale, Goodyear, Apache Junction, Sun Lakes, East Mesa, Laveen, Gold Canyon, Queen Creek, Chandler Fashion Center Mall, Chandler City Hall, Fiesta Mall, Tumbleweed Park, Arizona Mills Mall and Gilbert City Hall.
This includes the following streams and drainages... Barge Creek, La, Barranca Creek, Agua Fria River, Lum Wash, Queen Creek, Tortilla Creek, Indian Bend Wash, Bulldog Wash, Salt River, Gila River, Lewis and Pranty Creek, First Water Creek, Waterman Wash, West Prong Waterman Wash and Corgett Wash.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 6:00 PM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 6:00 PM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 6:00 PM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 6:00 PM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
